data.text: Ndiela zitisanga Yave mu luzingu luama loso ;
Kadi tula diana dieno mu bana ba mintinu,
Pheve awu yawu kuenda buna beti vutuka mu ntoto ;
Lusakumunu kuidi mutu wowo widi ti Nzambi yi Yakobi
mvangi wu diyilu, ntoto, mbu ayi bibio bidi muna ;
Niandi weti vavila mambu ma bobo beti yamusu,
Yave weti vana kiezila kuidi phofo,
